name: NoahHerman'stechreview
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: noah herman's tech review
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Noah Herman's tech review Skill is based on Noah Herman's well known YouTube channel
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxg8tC0Ng0T6xizqsPWnV7g

Noah Herman's tech review delivers breaking news on the consumer tech industry and reviews on the latest products. Use this action to get content preview for the Noah Herman Youtube channel.

[Contents]
Noah Herman's tech review shares Noah Herman's experiences with the latest tech products such as MacBooks, iPads, iPhones, Galaxy phones and tablets, and also accessories for such devices. For people considering buying a product, Noah Herman's tech review can provide insight into what to buy and what to avoid.

[How to use]
You can say, “Alexa, open Noah Herman's tech review” to hear the latest stories. While listening to a story, you can say ”Alexa, stop” to stop the story. You can continue to the next story by answering “Yes” to the question “Would you like to read the next post?"

Example phrase:
"Alexa, open noah herman's tech review"

[Dialogue flow]
a. The Action will play its welcome message upon hearing the user’s command, “Alexa, open Noah Herman's tech review."
b. The Action will automatically play the most recent posting from the Noah Herman's tech review board from wecast.ai.
c.After playing the most recent post, the Action will ask “Would you like to read the next post?”
- If the listener says “Yes”, the Action will play the next posting
- If the listener says “No”, the Action will exit the Action
 
For more information, please visit Noah Herman's Youtube Channel and don’t forget to subscribe!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxg8tC0Ng0T6xizqsPWnV7g
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
